summary.span: 提供有关 中的 元素的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the elements within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素是 的唯一允许的子元素。 elements are the only allowable child elements of a . 中 元素的顺序定义了页面顺序。The order of the elements within the defines the page order. 提供有关 中 元素的信息，而无需应用程序加载单独的页面。 provides information about the elements within a without the requiring the application to load individual pages. 依赖关系属性指定相应 的统一资源标识符（URI）。The dependency property specifies the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the corresponding . 有关 元素的详细信息，请参阅 XPS *OPEN XML 纸张规格*的第3章，可在 xps 上下载[：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* available for download at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了将 添加到 的过程。The following example shows the process of adding to a . [!code-csharp[XpsSave#XpsSaveCreateFixedDocPages](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/CSharp/XpfContent.cs#xpssavecreatefixeddocpages)] [!code-vb[XpsSave#XpsSaveCreateFixedDocPages](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/visualbasic/xpfcontent.vb#xpssavecreatefixeddocpages)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当以下情况时， 属性返回 ：The property returns a when: 1. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 标记中定义了一个即时 子元素。 has an immediate child defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup. 2. 已调用 将 设置为 的子级。The has been called to set the as the child of the . 当以下情况时， 属性返回**null** ：The property returns **null** when: 1. 由 属性设置（当由 属性指定时， 不缓存）。The is set by the property (when specified by the property, the is not cached). 使用 或 来返回 属性设置的。Use or to return the when set by the property. 有关 元素的详细信息，请参阅 XPS *XML 纸张规范*的第3章，可在[http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx)下载。For more information about the element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *XML Paper Specification* available for download at [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能在 XAML 中使用此属性。You cannot use this property in XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行 的同步加载和分析。 performs synchronous loading and parsing of the . > [!NOTE] > 使用 而不是 来避免在 加载时线程阻塞。Use the instead of to avoid thread blocking while the loads.

summary.span: 异步加载并返回 内容元素。

span.span: Asynchronously loads and returns the content element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步加载和分析与此 相关联的 数据流。 asynchronously loads and parses the data stream associated with this . 完成时，其他线程将继续运行。Other threads will continue to run while completes. 以下步骤演示了如何以异步方式加载 内容：The following steps illustrate how to load the content asynchronously: 1. 创建 委托，并将其添加到 事件的通知。Create a delegate and add it to be notified of events. 2. 调用 。Call . 3. 当发生 事件并且调用委托时， 内容已完成加载。When the event occurs and the delegate is called, the content has completed loading. 通过 返回加载的 元素。The loaded element is returned through the . 属性。property. 有关 `` 元素的详细信息，请参阅 xps 规范的第3章，该规范可在[xps：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)中获取。For more information about the `` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
